basic.description: A lecture-seminar course in which muscular, metabolic, and endocrine adaptations to exercise will be discussed in detail focusing on the effects of acute exercise and physical conditioning on the major energy producing systems (carbohydrate and lipid metabolism). Summer  2013.  PREREQUISITE: KNPE-427 or equivalent.
basic.subject: KHS
basic.title: Muscle Physiology

extra.enrollment_requirement: KHS 884: Prerequisite of KNPE 427 or equivalent
